mapper.insert: insert into fb_member(id, pw, mname, mnick, mbirth, mtype) values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{mname}, #{mnick}, #{mbirth}, #{mtype})
mapper.select: select count(mnick) as cnt from fb_member where mnick=#{mnick}
select count(id) as cnt from fb_member where id is not null
mapper.update: update fb_member set pw=#{pw}, mname=#{mname}, mnick=#{mnick}, mtype=#{mtype} where id=#{id}
update fb_member set mtype=#{mtype} where id=#{id}
update fb_member set mpoint=#{mpoint} where id=#{id}
